content: आग्नीध्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Belonging to the अग्नीध्र (the priest who kindles the fire). --ध्रं [आग्निमिंधे अग्नीत् तस्य शरणं, रण् भत्वान्न जश् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} The place where the sacrificial or sacred fire is kindled. {@--2@} The duty of the priest who kindles the sacred fire. --ध्रा Care of the sacred fire. --ध्रः The priest who kindles the sacred fire.
